00025 class Sequencer;
00026 
00027 #define QUEUE_LENGTH 25
00028 
00029 
00030 typedef struct
00031 {
00032         unsigned int uid;
00033         int type;
00034         char data[MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH];
00035         unsigned int datalen;
00036 } queue_entry_t;
00037 
00039 class Broadcaster

00054
